idea-plugin.name: Highlight Colors for Compose
idea-plugin.description:
Draws rectangle on editor's gutter denoting the color represented by 
androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color

Clicking on the color icon from the gutter will open a color picker dialog to modify the color.
idea-plugin.change-notes: 0.0.20 - Fixed: Issue with modifying color on non-writable files. 0.0.1 - Initial release - Open-sourced on Github
